getAllowGeneratedReplies().Description: Return whether the platform should automatically generate possible replies for this @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationCompat#Action_E@

getExtras().Description: Get additional metadata carried around with this Action.

getRemoteInputs().Description: Get the list of inputs to be collected from the user when this action is sent. May return null if no remote inputs were added. Only returns inputs which accept a text input. For inputs which only accept data use @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationCompat#Action#getDataOnlyRemoteInputs_E@.

getDataOnlyRemoteInputs().Description: Get the list of inputs to be collected from the user that ONLY accept data when this action is sent. These remote inputs are guaranteed to return true on a call to @B_android#support#v4#app#RemoteInput#isDataOnly_E@. May return null if no data-only remote inputs were added. This method exists so that legacy RemoteInput collectors that pre-date the addition of non-textual RemoteInputs do not access these remote inputs.

ClassDesc: Structure to encapsulate a named action that can be shown as part of this notification. It must include an icon, a label, and a https:##developer#android#com@B_android#app#PendingIntent_E@ to be fired when the action is selected by the user. Action buttons won't appear on platforms prior to Android 4.1. Apps should use @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationCompat#Builder#addAction_E@ or @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationCompat#Builder#addAction_E@ to attach actions.
